data.md:MetaData: 1 surface sample sedimentology, 1 surface sample archive, 2 core section: 0-0.39 m, 1 frozen subcore, 10 and 11 discrete samples from 0-26 cmbsf and 0-31 cmbsf, 1 sample dropstones with bryozoans, olive mud, Mn-coated dropstones with bryozoans
The Expedition ANTARKTIS-XXIII/4 of the Research Vessel Polarstern in 2006
